mapper.select: SELECT T1.email ,T1.media_introduce AS mediaIntroduce ,T1.region AS region ,T1.ad_category AS adCategory ,T1.media_url AS mediaUrl ,T2.nickname AS nickname ,T2.profile_img_nm AS profileImgNm ,T2.profile_origin_file_nm AS profileOriginFileNm ,T2.profile_img_file_path AS profileImgFilePath FROM adgomin_media_introduce T1 LEFT JOIN adgomin_user T2 ON T1.email = T2.email WHERE T2.user_order = #{userOrder}

SELECT portfolio_order AS portfolioOrder ,email AS email ,portfolio_title AS portfolioTitle ,portfolio_ad_detail_category AS portfolioAdDetailCategory ,portfolio_ad_category AS portfolioAdCategory ,portfolio_region AS portfolioRegion ,main_img_nm AS mainImgNm ,main_origin_file_nm AS mainOriginFileNm ,main_img_file_path AS mainImgFilePath ,create_dt AS createDt ,modify_dt AS modifyDt FROM adgomin_portfolio WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email} LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT portfolio_order AS portfolioOrder ,email AS email ,portfolio_title AS portfolioTitle ,portfolio_ad_detail_category AS portfolioAdDetailCategory ,portfolio_ad_category AS portfolioAdCategory ,portfolio_region AS portfolioRegion ,main_img_nm AS mainImgNm ,main_origin_file_nm AS mainOriginFileNm ,main_img_file_path AS mainImgFilePath FROM adgomin_portfolio WHERE 1=1 AND portfolio_order = #{portfolioOrder}

SELECT portfolio_img_order AS portfolioImgOrder ,portfolio_order AS portfolioOrder ,email AS email ,img_nm AS imgNm ,origin_file_nm AS originFileNm ,img_file_path AS imgFilePath FROM adgomin_portfolio_img WHERE 1=1 AND portfolio_order = #{portfolioOrder}
